TopicTitle: Any tips on higher FPS with visual mods?

Articles.Content:
I might be getting a new graphics card soon, so in the mean time, or if I don't get it, are there any tips to have a higher FPS when you're using EVE and scatterer?

Edited April 2, 2017 by Quarkz
Visual mods hit hard. I went from 120 to 50 fps with EVE, SVE, Scatterer, DistantObject and Planetshine installed. I have a gtx1070 and play at 2560x1440.

Graphic card does a very little in KSP, of course with the visual mods a bit more, but your processor is way more important.
What's your current build?
I have a 6700k OC to 4.4 and a 1070 in 1080p and yep visual mods TANK performance.

On 4/3/2017 at 11:58 AM, DrLicor said:

Graphic card does a very little in KSP, of course with the visual mods a bit more, but your processor is way more important.
What's your current build?

Sorry to not reply to your answer in a week. 

But, I have a Intel i5-4460 core with a CPU at 3.20 GHz, with 8 GB of ram, and a 64 bit computer. 

My KSP build is 1.2.2
